name: GitHub
help: This class provides different tasks to work with GitHub repositories.

properties.name: ArtifactPaths
properties.help: Optional file paths for files that should be appended to a release

properties.name: ReleaseNotes
properties.help: The message for the GitHub release

properties.name: Tag
properties.help: The tag that should be used for the release, e.g. "v1.0.0"

properties.name: Token
properties.help: The Token for the GitHub API

properties.name: CommitSha
properties.help: The commit SHA on which to create the release

properties.name: RepositoryOwner
properties.help: The account under which the repository is hosted
